title: Substance Designer 5+Crack
description:
==========================================
Substance Designer 5 is a powerful and complete compositing tool that allows you to create material (substance) or texture bitmap file. Substance Designer allows you to create your own templates which compatible with any game engine. Substance Designer 5 contains a library of various materials, tools, and effects; and this tool can also be used to create texture assets and certainly suited for meet all you need in a few compact and handy nodes.
==========================================
Features:

Real-time 3D View to visualize texturing
Bake your maps at light-speed directly
New and advanced Procedural Art
Node-based texturing tool for PBR
Non-linear workflow and quick iterations
Compatible with any game engine, and many more.

==========================================
Requirements:

Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 (64-bit)
2 GHz processor
4 GB RAM
512 MB VRAM
DirectX 9/10/11
